headline: Chevron Upgrades Pasadena Refinery to Increase Capacity, Feedstock and Product Flexibility
summary: PASADENA, Texas, December 10, 2024--Chevron U.S.A., Inc. (CUSA), a wholly owned subsidiary of Chevron Corporation (NYSE: CVX), has completed a retrofit of its refinery in Pasadena, Texas, which is expected to increase product flexibility and expand the processing capacity of lighter crudes by nearly 15 percent to 125,000 barrels per day.
